common.firstLoginTutorialDescription: Let's quickly get acquainted with the application.
common.tutorialCompleteMessage: You are now ready to start using JYSK Warehouse.
common.tutorialStep1Content: On the main page, you can search for articles by their ID to find their location in the warehouse.
common.tutorialStep2Content: Use the barcode scanning feature to quickly find an article or add it to the system.
common.tutorialStep3Content: In the 'Rack Management' section, you can add, edit, and delete racks and their shelves.
common.tutorialStep4Content: The 'Mass Add Articles' feature allows you to quickly add multiple articles to a specific location in the warehouse.
common.tutorialStep5Content: As an administrator, you can manage user accounts, assign roles and permissions.
common.tutorialStep6Content: As an administrator, you can add, edit, and delete stores in the system.
common.tutorialStep7Content: In the activity log, you can monitor all important events in the system.
common.noPermission: You do not have permission to view this page.
common.exportDataPageDescription: Select the types of data you want to export and the file format.
common.noDataSelected: Please select at least one data type to export.
common.copyArticlesDescription: Copy all articles from one store to another. You can overwrite existing articles in the target store.
common.overwriteExistingArticles: Overwrite existing articles in target store
common.noPermissionToCopyArticles: You do not have permission to copy articles between stores.
common.fillSourceAndTargetStore: Please fill in source and target store.
common.sourceAndTargetCannotBeSame: Source and target store cannot be the same.
common.noArticlesToCopy: No articles to copy in store {{storeId}}.
common.articlesCopiedSuccess: Successfully copied {{copiedCount}} articles to store {{targetStoreId}}. Skipped: {{skippedCount}}.
common.globalArticlesInfo: Here you can manage articles that are automatically added to every newly created store. These articles are global and not tied to a specific store.
common.editGlobalArticleDescription: Here you can edit the details of a global article.
common.addGlobalArticleDescription: Here you can add a new global article.

common.attemptToAddExistingGlobalArticle: Attempt to add existing global article
common.confirmDeleteGlobalArticleDescription: Are you sure you want to delete global article {{articleId}}? This action cannot be undone and will affect all stores that use this article.
